snippet.title: Powder Game Official Preview (iOS & Android)
snippet.description:
iOS (https://itunes.apple.com/app/id521519384&mt=8)
Android (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=jp.danball.powdergameviewer)
Kindle Fire (http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00BZ41DCY)

Imagine cool phenomenon when wind blows falling leaves.
This game simulates the phenomenon with powder (dots)!

DAN-BALL http://dan-ball.jp/
